description:
Aoki Reika is Miyuki`s classmate. She is the student council vice president and a member of the school`s archery club. Reika is generally elegant and kind-hearted, but has a frightening temper once her patience reaches its limit. Her family background is full of antiquity, making her a yamato nadeshiko. Her potential as a Pretty Cure was awakened when she stood up to Majorina who tramples her companions` effort to the duty of student council. As Cure Beauty, her dark blue hair becomes a lighter blue and grows longer, and is pulled back by the tiara she wears. She can manipulate ice in this form.
She introduces herself as "Snowing, falling and gathering, a noble heart! Cure Beauty!"
name: Aoki Reika
